biotools.summary:
QuiC generates quality control metrics for liquid chromatography and mass spectrometry in near real-time from raw files from various vendors and bottom-up proteomics workflows using a commercially available standard.

Requires Biognosys iRT Kit to enable automated, fast and accurate QC monitoring of your data sets.

bioschemas.name: QuiC
